title: Pygmy Necklace
summaries: The Pygmy Necklace is a pre-Hardmode / post-Plantera accessory that provides the player with one additional minion slot. It is purchased from the Witch Doctor for 20 at night.

On the <linked>[img:Old-gen console version]</linked><linked> Old-gen console version</linked>, <linked>Nintendo 3DS</linked><linked>[img:Nintendo 3DS version]</linked><linked> version</linked>, and <linked>[img:Legacy tModLoader version]</linked><linked> Legacy tModLoader version</linked>, the player must have defeated Plantera and have the <linked>Pygmy Staff</linked> in their inventory in order for the <linked>Witch Doctor</linked> to sell the item.

statistics.Tooltip: Increases your max number of minions by 1
statistics.Buy: 20
statistics.Sell: 4
